text: is a Japanese politician, journalist, historian, social critic and biographer. He was Governor of Tokyo between 2012 and 2013.Japan Times Inose wins landslide victory in Tokyo December 18, 2012 He resigned because of a political scandal about funding. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tokyo Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Naoki Inose
